mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VerificationCode ( phoneNo, type, verificationCode, invalidTime, createTime, delflag) VALUES ( #{phoneNo}, #{type}, #{verificationCode}, #{invalidTime}, #{createTime}, #{delflag} )
mapper.select: select * from VerificationCode t where t.phoneNo= #{phoneNo} and t.verificationCode= #{verificationCode} and t.createTime >= NOW()
